attributes.long-description:
Join your favorite bomb-slinging hero on the PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system! Help Bomberman stop Puglar's robot army with the timeless Bomberman® gameplay you've come to know and love. Fight up to three other players, or in this case: enemies! Play 50 levels from the original Bomberman® in Classic Mode, or take on new challenges and bosses in all 50 levels. This game features 3D characters and environments in very cool worlds including jungle, spook, and bomber. Specially made for the PSP® system, this game retains the style and charm that's made Bomberman® so great. Take advantage of a number of great items and power-ups that allow you to gain speed, walk through walls, lay mines, and more with the help of the easy-to-use Item Stock system on the PSP® system's wide screen. Now you can strategically decide which power-up to use! With slick gameplay and controls, this game offers a new generation of classic fun!

©2006 HUDSON SOFT

"BOMBERMAN" is a registered trademark of HUDSON SOFT.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
attributes.name: BOMBERMAN® LEGACY
